text: The 2018 Italian Athletics Championships was the 108th edition of the Italian Athletics Championships and took place in Pescara from 7 to 9 September. ==Champions== {| class="wikitable" width=70% style="font-size:90%; text- align:center;" |-bgcolor=moccasin |align=center colspan=5|Track events |- !Event !!Men !!Performance !!Women !!Performance |- |100 m |align=left|Marcell Jacobs ||10.24 |align=left|Johanelis Herrera Abreu ||11.59 |- |200 m |align=left|Davide Re || 21.04 |align=left|Irene Siragusa || 23.25 |- |400 m |align=left|Davide Re ||45.92 |align=left|Raphaela Lukudo ||52.38 |- |800 m |align=left|Enrico Brazzale ||1:46.93 |align=left| ||2:02.47 |- |1500 m |align=left|Joao Bussotti || 3:46.41 |align=left|Giulia Aprile || 4:15.80 |- |5000 m |align=left|Marouan Razine || 14:04.31 |align=left|Nadia Battocletti || 16:15.30 |- |110/100 m hs |align=left|Lorenzo Perini || 13.57 |align=left|Luminosa Bogliolo || 13.21 |- |400 m hs |align=left|José Bencosme || 49.52 |align=left|Yadisleidy Pedroso || 55.62 |- |3000 m st |align=left|Leonardo Feletto || 8:34.17 |align=left|Isabel Mattuzzi || 9:51.89 |- |4x100 m relay |align=left|Atletica Riccardi Milano 1946 Federico Cattaneo Marco Martini Hillary Wanderson Polanco Rijo || 40.39 |align=left|Centro Sportivo Carabinieri Maria Enrica Spacca Gloria Hooper Anna Bongiorni Giulia Latini || |- |4x400 m relay |align=left|G.S.
